content: So I think we've put that behind us now between the impairment in the fourth quarter inventory reserves and we're looking forward to having a focus on products that are much easier to predict, the growth rates and the consumption of and will be much easier on our manufacturing processes to stay efficient versus the challenges we've had and everyone's had on trying to predict demand in planned raw material purchases and production schedules around various waves during the pandemic as we kind of transition into what we're used to as a business with our legacy of just dealing with the respiratory seasons.
